p1: I was born and raised in Saudi. For the past few years, I've been living in my favourite place ðŸ—½NYCðŸ—½. I work here as a software engineer with the most incredible team @{shopifyLink}. p2: Away from the keyboard, I have a lot of curiosity about people and cultures and different ways of living. I think the majority of my opinions and personality come from experinces I've had whilst travelling. I very much love the people in my life (family/friends). p3: I have a ton of hobbies. I spend a lot of time around books/music/films as well as being out in nature. The highest I've climbed is ~6,000 meters {mountain}. I also bike everywhere, sometimes to other countries {wink}
p4: I'm like that person with an accent and face you can't seem to place, like in ~7 or so languages {smile}. I don't use social media, but would love to connect over email, my email is saleh@alghusson.com
